product_name: Vasque Mindbender Trail-Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Vasque Mindbender Shoes Trail-Running Shoes provide support, plenty of cushioning and excellent traction for running your favorite trails, wet or dry. Breathable, abrasion-resistant synthetic leather and nylon mesh uppers are lightweight and flexible for comfort; thermoplastic urethane overlays provide structure and support. Nylon linings absorb excess moisture and disperse it for fast drying; protective toe bumpers shield toes and uppers from abrasion. Padded tongues and collars add comfort and relieve pressure from lacing. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. Thermoplastic urethane shanks and nylon forefoot plates provide support and stability on rough terrain and protection from sharp objects underfoot. Molded dual-density EVA midsoles cushion your foot strike and assist in heel-to-midfoot transition. Blur trail-running outsoles on the women's Vasque Mindbender Shoes utilize a slip-resistant rubber compound and feature aggressive, multidirectional lugs for superior traction. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Vasque Mindbender Shoes Trail-Running Shoes provide support, plenty of cushioning and excellent traction for running your favorite trails, wet or dry.
